name: Pumpkin Harvest Simulator
description:
A very simple arcadey game where you have to collect the pumpkins.

Press a square to water then again to plant a pumpkin seed. Keep pressing when it dries out to water and then harvest your pumpkin. Be quick, or the ghosts will come and steal it.

Press R at any time to refresh the map or start over also this will play the song.

Press on the well with your mouse to fill up the water meter.

You start with one seed, harvest pumpkins to get more.

Please consider donating, this is free and open source software released under the GPL-3.0 License.

Happy Hacking

https://github.com/MarkusReynolds1989/Autumn-Game

Music :

Second javascript game I've ever made so forgive the bad code :)
